credit_line: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
title: Textile samples
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed on chiffon
description: Four samples of printed chiffon, with a design of scalloped horizontal bands alternating light and dark with garlands of minute roses and other flowers in the light bands, and sprays of the same flowers in the dark bands. Each sample has both selvedges present, but a and b are twice the width of c and d.
name: Textile samples
